member.name: P:HotTotem.RoundedContentView.RoundedContentView.FillColor
member.summary: The background color of the rounded ContentView

member.name: F:HotTotem.RoundedContentView.RoundedContentView.FillColorProperty
member.summary: The background color of the rounded ContentView

member.name: P:HotTotem.RoundedContentView.RoundedContentView.CornerRadius
member.summary: The Corner Radius of the ContentView Defaults to 0 which is not rounded.

member.name: P:HotTotem.RoundedContentView.RoundedContentView.Circle
member.summary: If set to true, the ContentView will be circular This means the edges will be rounded as much as necessary to form a circle
